issue.title: zerossl 配合 cf 申请证书失败
zerossl 配合 cf 申请证书失败

comment.body: 解决了，api_token 填了之前acme.sh 的key，重新申请一个token，现在可以正常申请到证书了，谢谢解答

issue.title: 报错信息不够详细
issue.body:
### 操作系统

Linux

### 系统版本

debian

### 安装类型

sing-box 原始命令行程序

### 如果您使用图形客户端程序，请提供该程序版本。

_No response_

### 版本

<details>
```console
# 使用输出内容覆盖此行
sing-box version 1.6.0-rc.2

Environment: go1.21.3 linux/amd64
Tags: with_gvisor,with_quic,with_dhcp,with_wireguard,with_ech,with_utls,with_reality_server,with_clash_api
Revision: bb4973caf605ab3794ace2b67853dc42f9a4c7a2
CGO: disabled
```
</details>

### 描述

报错信息不够详细，当输入一个错误的配置时只会提供一个较为模糊的报错，希望能提供具体的配置报错行号，或者具体位置

### 重现方式

对于给定的如下配置文件：

```json
{
  "outbounds": [
    {"type": "direct"},
    {"tag": "aaa"}
  ]
}
```

其中 `tag` 为 `aaa` 的 outbound 漏了填写 type，运行 `sing-box check -c sing-box.json`输出如下

```console
$ ./sing-box/sing-box check -c sing-box.json
FATAL[0000] decode config at sing-box.json: unknown outbound type:
```

该报错信息较为迷惑，让人难以排查到底是哪个 outbound 出现的问题。本文提供的是复现该报错的最小配置文件，实际配置中可能有几十上百个 outbound，从中排查出问题较为麻烦，因此希望报错提示能更为准确

### 日志

<details>
```console
# 使用日志内容覆盖此行
```
</details>

issue.title: DNS 响应被错误解析到 fakeip 而无法出站
issue.body:
### 操作系统

Windows

### 系统版本

Windows 11 22H2 22621.382

### 安装类型

sing-box 原始命令行程序

### 如果您使用图形客户端程序，请提供该程序版本。

_No response_

### 版本

```
sing-box version 1.6.0-beta.1  Environment: go1.21.1 windows/amd64

Tags: with_acme,with_quic,with_grpc,with_dhcp,with_wireguard,with_ech,with_utls,with_clash_api,with_gvisor,with_reality_server 

Revision: bc4545f2ef41745e5f90c6899e5026845e440f82 CGO: disabled
```

### 描述

当我开启 mixed-inbound，并且在浏览器通过插件封装成 socks5 流量导入 sing-box 之后，域名被错误解析到 FakeIP 导致网页无法访问。

部分配置：

```json
{
  "dns": {
    "fakeip": {
      "enabled": true,
      "inet4_range": "198.18.0.0/15",
      "inet6_range": "fc00::/18"
    },
    "servers": [
      {
        "tag": "proxyDns",
        "address": "tcp://8.8.4.4",
        "detour": "proxy"
      },
      {
        "tag": "fakedns",
        "address": "fakeip"
      }
    ],
    "rules": [
      {
        "domain_regex": ".",
        "server": "fakedns",
        "rewrite_ttl": 1
      }
    ],
    "final": "domesticDns",
    "strategy": "ipv4_only",
    "independent_cache": true
  },
  "inbounds": [
    {
      "tag": "mixed",
      "type": "mixed",
      "listen": "::",
      "listen_port": 23334,
      "sniff": true,
      "domain_strategy": "ipv4_only"
    }
  ]
}
```

### 重现方式

`./sing-box.exe run -D ./ -c config.json`

### 日志

```console
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 INFO [3913526727 0ms] inbound/mixed[mixed]: inbound connection from 127.0.0.1:63811
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 INFO [3913526727 0ms] inbound/mixed[mixed]: inbound connection to www.baidu.com:443
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 DEBUG [3913526727 2ms] router: sniffed protocol: tls, domain: www.baidu.com
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 DEBUG [3913526727 2ms] dns: lookup domain www.baidu.com
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 DEBUG [3913526727 3ms] dns: match[0] domain_regex=. => fakedns
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 INFO [3913526727 3ms] dns: lookup succeed for www.baidu.com: 198.18.0.3
+0800 2023-10-16 17:56:26 DEBUG [3913526727 3ms] dns: resolved [198.18.0.3]
```

comment.body: Maybe it's just an expected behavior? You can use `outbound` in `dns.rules[]` to avoid using FakeIP for specific outbound, this requires an explicit specified outbound `direct`.

issue.title: geoip.db download problem
issue.body:
### Operating system

Linux

### System version

1.6.0-rc.1 

### Installation type

Original sing-box Command Line

### If you are using a graphical client, please provide the version of the client.

_No response_

### Version

<details>
```console
sing-box version 1.6.0-rc.1

Environment: go1.21.3 linux/amd64
Tags: with_gvisor,with_quic,with_dhcp,with_wireguard,with_ech,with_utls,with_reality_server,with_clash_api
Revision: 03f4cd115c7bc2b8d2547c63b07c020882765521
CGO: disabled

```
</details>

### Description

if geoip.db download get error or timeout sing-box create empty file geoip.db with 0 byte
so i try to restart sing-box because i think it try to redownload the geoip.db file
but it is not . becuase geoip.db file created but with empty content
so it throw error 

> open geoip database : error opening database: invalid MaxMind DB file

i think you must check the file size and if it is 0 try to redownload the file


### Reproduction

if you have some slow network you can test to download geoip.db and if you get timeout for download file an empty geoip.db  is create so the sing-box think that the file is downloaded!

### Logs

_No response_

Add TLS self sign generate command
